title: DevBlog | Julien Conan
description: My blog journey. Welcome to designers, developers, and every others.

home.title: Hi! I'm Julien
home.description: I have been a software engineer since 2012. As a consultant since 2019, I have had the opportunity to work in small, medium and large companies with a staff ranging from a few individuals to several dozen. I love learning, discovering and mastering different tools and methodologies aimed at improving production as a whole. Passionate about software factories and driven by the values of devops and agile development, I try to focus on cultivating the social capital of a group while maintaining a growth and continuous improvement mindset. You can meet me at trade shows or meetups dedicated to architecture, security and sharing good practices.
